items.title: Agent Lightning: Adding reinforcement learning to AI agents without code rewrites
items.content:
By decoupling how agents work from how they’re trained, Agent Lightning turns each step an agent takes into data for reinforcement learning. This makes it easy for developers to improve agent performance with almost zero code changes.

The post Agent Lightning: Adding reinforcement learning to AI agents without code rewrites appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.creator: Xufang Luo, Yuge Zhang, Zhiyuan He, Zilong Wang, Dongsheng Li, Luna K. Qiu, Yuqing Yang
items.summary: Agent Lightning通过将智能体的行为与其训练过程解耦，将智能体的每一步操作转化为强化学习数据，使开发者无需大量代码修改即可轻松提升智能体性能。该技术简化了AI智能体的强化学习集成过程。

items.title: Promptions helps make AI prompting more precise with dynamic UI controls
items.content:
Promptions helps developers add dynamic, context-aware controls to chat interfaces so users can guide generative AI responses. It lets users shape outputs quickly without writing long instructions.

The post Promptions helps make AI prompting more precise with dynamic UI controls appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.summary: Promotions是一款帮助开发者为聊天界面添加动态、上下文感知控件的工具，使用户能够精确引导生成式AI的响应。它允许用户快速调整输出结果，无需编写冗长指令。该工具旨在提升AI提示的精确性，并已发布于Microsoft Research。

items.title: GigaTIME: Scaling tumor microenvironment modeling using virtual population generated by multimodal AI
items.content:
Using AI-generated virtual populations, Microsoft researchers uncovered hidden cellular patterns that could reshape how we understand and treat cancer.

The post GigaTIME: Scaling tumor microenvironment modeling using virtual population generated by multimodal AI appeared first on Microsoft Research.
items.contentSnippet:

items.creator: Hoifung Poon, Jeya Maria Jose Valanarasu, Naoto Usuyama, Sheng Wang
items.summary: 微软研究人员利用AI生成的虚拟人群，揭示了肿瘤微环境中隐藏的细胞模式，可能改变我们对癌症的理解和治疗方式。这项名为GigaTIME的研究通过多模态AI技术，实现了肿瘤微环境建模的规模化，为癌症研究提供了新的视角和方法。

items.title: Ideas: Community building, machine learning, and the future of AI
items.content:
As the Women in Machine Learning Workshop (WiML) marks its 20th annual gathering, cofounders, friends, and collaborators Jenn Wortman Vaughan and Hanna Wallach reflect on WiML’s evolution, navigating the field of ML, and their work in responsible AI.

The post Ideas: Community building, machine learning, and the future of AI appeared first on Microsoft Research.

The post Ideas: Community building, machine learning, and the future of AI appeared first on Microsoft Research.
items.creator: Jenn Wortman Vaughan, Hanna Wallach
items.summary: 微软研究院文章回顾了机器学习女性研讨会（WiML）20周年历程。创始人Jenn Wortman Vaughan和Hanna Wallach探讨了WiML的演变、机器学习领域发展以及他们在负责任人工智能方面的合作。文章聚焦社区建设、机器学习与人工智能未来。

items.title: Reducing Privacy leaks in AI: Two approaches to contextual integrity
items.content:
New research explores two ways to give AI agents stronger privacy safeguards grounded in contextual integrity. One adds lightweight, inference-time checks; the other builds contextual awareness directly into models through reasoning and RL.

The post Reducing Privacy leaks in AI: Two approaches to contextual integrity  appeared first on Microsoft Research.

New research explores two ways to give AI agents stronger privacy safeguards grounded in contextual integrity. One adds lightweight, inference-time checks; the other builds contextual awareness directly into models through reasoning and RL.
The post Reducing Privacy leaks in AI: Two approaches to contextual integrity  appeared first on Microsoft Research.
items.creator: Gbola Afonja, Huseyin Atahan Inan, Qingwei Lin 林庆维, Saravan Rajmohan, Robert Sim, Xiaoting Qin, Jue Zhang, Lukas Wutschitz
items.summary: 新研究探讨了两种基于情境完整性的方法，为AI代理提供更强的隐私保护。一种方法是在推理时添加轻量级检查，另一种是通过推理和强化学习将情境感知直接构建到模型中。这两种方法旨在减少AI中的隐私泄露问题。

items.title: Fara-7B: An Efficient Agentic Model for Computer Use
items.content:
Fara-7B is our first agentic small language model for computer use. This experimental model includes robust safety measures to aid responsible deployment. Despite its size, Fara-7B holds its own against larger, more resource-intensive agentic systems.

The post Fara-7B: An Efficient Agentic Model for Computer Use appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.summary: Fara-7B是微软研发的首款面向计算机使用的智能小语言模型。该模型虽小，但具备高效性能，并内置安全机制以确保负责任部署。实验表明，Fara-7B在资源消耗上优于大型智能系统，展现出良好的竞争力。

items.title: MMCTAgent: Enabling multimodal reasoning over large video and image collections
items.content:
MMCTAgent enables dynamic multimodal reasoning with iterative planning and reflection. Built on Microsoft’s AutoGen framework, it integrates language, vision, and temporal understanding for complex tasks like long video and image analysis.

The post MMCTAgent: Enabling multimodal reasoning over large video and image collections appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.creator: Akshay Nambi, Kavyansh Chourasia, Tanuja Ganu
items.summary: MMCTAgent是一款基于Microsoft AutoGen框架的多模态推理工具，支持动态多模态推理，通过迭代规划和反思实现复杂任务。它整合了语言、视觉和时间理解能力，适用于大规模视频和图像分析。

items.title: BlueCodeAgent: A blue teaming agent enabled by automated red teaming for CodeGen AI
items.content:
BlueCodeAgent is an end-to-end blue-teaming framework built to boost code security using automated red-teaming processes, data, and safety rules to guide LLMs’ defensive decisions. Dynamic testing reduces false positives in vulnerability detection.

The post BlueCodeAgent: A blue teaming agent enabled by automated red teaming for CodeGen AI appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.creator: Chengquan Guo , Yuzhou  Nie, Chulin Xie, Zinan Lin, Wenbo Guo, Bo Li
items.summary: BlueCodeAgent是一个端到端的蓝队协作框架，旨在通过自动化红队流程、数据和安全性规则来提升代码安全性，指导LLM的防御决策。动态测试可减少漏洞检测中的误报。该框架由微软研究院开发。

items.title: When industry knowledge meets PIKE-RAG: The innovation behind Signify’s customer service boost
items.content:
A collaboration between Signify and Microsoft Research shows how PIKE-RAG improves enterprise knowledge systems, delivering a 12% increase in accuracy and faster, more reliable answers.

The post When industry knowledge meets PIKE-RAG: The innovation behind Signify’s customer service boost appeared first on Microsoft Research.

items.title: Magentic Marketplace: an open-source simulation environment for studying agentic markets
items.content:
AI agents are poised to transform digital marketplaces. To explore what can happen when AI agents interact and transact at scale, we built Magentic Marketplace, an open-source simulation environment for studying agentic market designs.

The post Magentic Marketplace: an open-source simulation environment for studying agentic markets appeared first on Microsoft Research.
